items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 4 February 2023
items.title: alles wie erwartet!
items.review_text: Handy wurde pünktlich geliefert. Es war Amazon renewed in hervorragender Qualität bestellt worden und diese ist auch geliefert worden! Keine Beanstandungen, keine Kratzer, alles TOP! Leider hatte sich meine Frau das Telefon größer vorgestellt und daher mussten wir es leider zurückgeben. Kurze Anfrage an den Händler und nach einem kurzen Emailwechsel und Angabe des Rücksendegrundes, gab es sogar das kostenlose Rücksendeetikett gratis! Top Service! unkompliziert und absolut weiterzuempfehlen!

items.review_text: Läuft ganz gut, alles okey

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 15 September 2022
items.title: Super Handy als Übergangü
items.review_text:
Handy wurde innerhalb von 4 Tagen geliefert! Ladekabel vorhanden!
Das Telefon ist bis auf einen kleinen Kratzer neben der Leiser Taste (also seitlich) in einem Topzustand, die Akkuleistung war bei 100 Prozent! Alles in allem für den Notfall und auch generell eine super nachhaltige, billige Variante! ☺️

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 23 March 2023
items.title: Sehr enttäuscht,das ist ein Betrüg
items.review_text:
Ich habe das Handy für meinen Bruder bestellt, das Handy kam ohne seine orginale Verpackung und ohne sein Orginal Ladekabel, drin war ein Ladekabel aus China, was noch schlimmer ist, als das Handy an ist, kommt plötzlich zwei weiße Punkten.
Ich will das Handy zurücksenden, ich muss für das Retourn 7€ bezahlen.
Sehr enttäuscht und unzufrieden.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 8 August 2021
items.title: Händler will Gewährleistungsschaden nicht begleichen
items.review_text:
Absolute Frechheit der Händler!
Das Gerät hatte von Anfang an Probleme bei der Verständigung beim Telefonieren und sehr bald darauf funktionierte die Kamera nicht mehr ordnungsgemäß.
Nachdem ich das Gerät zurückgesandt habe, darf ich mir vorwerfen lassen, dass das Gerät durch mich schwere Schlagschäden erlitten haben soll und der Fehler nicht unentgeltlich behoben wird.
Der Händler ignoriert sämtliche Argumentationen und lenkt höflich und sehr gekonnt von den angesprochenen Argumentationen ab. Schlußendlich stellt sich der Händler als entgegenkommend dar unterstützt jedoch in keiner Weise eine Faire Abhandlung meiner gesetzlich zustehenden Gewährleistung.
Da sich der Händler in keiner Weise einsichtig sieht, muss ich mich nun sogar zum Anwalt bequemen, da ich das sicher nicht auf mir sitzen lasse.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 April 2023
items.title: Pleased with phone and delivery
items.review_text: The phone was just what I wanted and delivery was fast and efficient. Price good.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 July 2021
items.title: So far so good
items.review_text: I received this iPhone in great condition, I would not have known it wasn’t new other than it arrived in a plain box. The only reason I haven’t given it 5 stars is I find the ‘home’ button a bit insensitive; I don’t know if this is because the phone is reconditioned or if this is a general issue with the iPhone 8. Also battery life not great if using the phone a lot however again I believe this is probably a generic iPhone issue (on checking the phone settings it states that the battery is 100%) Overall I’m happy with this purchase and reassured by the Amazon guarantee.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 November 2022
items.title: Works like advertised!
items.review_text: Extremely satisfied with purchase. How the seller advertised the product is exactly what turned up. As for delivery, the phone turned up within two days of order as opposed to the seven days I was expecting as estimated by their system so that was an even bigger bonus. Phone works like brand new. Really happy!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 January 2023
items.title: Exlcellent cindition
items.review_text: A present for my daughter. She was delighted with quality of the camera, condition and colour. Battery life was not too bad but gets charged every day.

items.title: Well...

I was sceptic before buying but i must say working great for now. Not a single scratch. Just only one thing. Battery was dead then arrived. Hopefully no need to return.
Update after almost 6months:(removed 2stars)
Battery dies after 2-3 short phone calls. I will keep for another few weeks,if situation wont change -have to return it....

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2023
items.title: All good
items.review_text: In really good cosmetic condition.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 October 2020
items.title: As good as new
items.review_text:
Was dispatched very quickly so phone arrived a day earlier than I expected. Came, not in original box, but well packaged with a charging cable and one of those little tools for opening the sim card slot, which was a nice touch.
Physically, the phone is literally as good as new, without any visible dings or scratches. 4G, Wifi, blue tooth, apple pay all thoroughly tested and working as they should. Battery health is 91%, which I think is pretty good, and I know I can get a replacement battery in the future for about £45 - so buying second hand is still a huge saving over new.
Overall I'm extremely impressed. I don't think I'll buy a new phone ever again.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2020
items.title: Used for a month now, battery issues after 6 months
items.review_text: The telephone came in a good package. Visually as new outside, no scratches etc. It initially hold 97% battery, so in principle nearly as new. The first thing that I noticed is that other people complain about quality sound when I am phoning them. It does not seem to be due to bad network. I am happy with the purchase and would buy  it again. A new iPhone SE would have costed twice as much with less storage space. The second problem started seven months after purchasing it. I took it to Apple today to get a new battery for £49.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 March 2022
items.title: Battery not as advertised
items.review_text: Battery only 76% not 80%+as advertised. Emailed suppliers but no reply. Customer service piss poor. I’ve only kept phone because it was still cheaper than buying elsewhere.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 December 2020
items.title: some features may not be available
items.review_text: The phone did appear to be in good condition. The packing could have been better . Sadly as the phone appeared to have had an after market screen fitted the button in settings to change the screen to white instead of yellow was missing. So returned it immediately. Pity as it seemed in appearance to be ok. But as it was a Xmas gift did not want to chance further issues.
